headline: American Water Charitable Foundation Supports Kentucky Communities Affected by Storms and Floods
summary: CAMDEN, N.J., April 17, 2025--The American Water Charitable Foundation, a philanthropic non-profit organization established by American Water (NYSE: AWK), the largest regulated water and wastewater utility company in the U.S., announced today that it provided a $15,000 grant to the American Red Cross, during the Kentucky Red Cross telethon, to support communities impacted by heavy rains and flash floods in Kentucky.
